channel.title: Private Servers
channel.description:
Hello everybody!
I am going to start a 317, but i have some questions.
1. How much will the change be they will catch my server? 2. Will they fine me or warn me? 3. I heard they will send a message to your host's mailbox, what does that exactly mean (i am using No-IP). And if that means the mailbox of No-IP, is there one?
Please give correct and serious answers. My parents already have some little problems with money, so i really can't take a fine.

item.title: Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @VbCoder VbCoder
item.description:
@VbCoder wrote:

If Jagex finds out that you got a rsps, I think they don’t really care…
I think they only try to sue the owners of big servers like dodian & frugooscape

“Yeah, but how to mther fcking shty crppy omega heck will they contact me?”
Well, I think they contact your internet provider and then email you that they’re going to sue you.

Read full topic

item.title: Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vinci Da Vinci
item.description:
@Da_Vinci wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:13, topic:352882”][quote author=orcashark link=topic=449197.msg3295706#msg3295706 date=1280929259]
They will ban you without any contact at all.
[/quote]
But wont they do anything to my server?[/quote]

The chance is very small because of the grand amount of PS’s open now, back in the days they shut down Frugoo but now the chance they do something to your server is 0.0001%.

Read full topic

item.title: Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“orcashark, post:8, topic:352882”]Then they wont contact you at all. They will just do it.

And nawh 508’s kill the purpose of RSPS. So do 562’s[/quote]

item.title: Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“orcashark, post:6, topic:352882”]There is really no difference if its 317 or 508, but 317 is better

Its like… 0.0001 in 10000000000000 chance they will catch you. Unless your an idiot and post your rs name and ip adress on this site, which i know you wont do.

But if they DO catch you, there will be no fine and they wont tell you, they will just ip ban you. Unless you gave Jagex your email by purchasing membership before, then you will get an email from them.[/quote]

Hmm… Okay. But if i didn’t set an e-mail, how will they contact me? P.S: I like 508’s more, better graphics

Read full topic

item.title: Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

There is really no difference if its 317 or 508, but 317 is better

Its like… 0.0001 in 10000000000000 chance they will catch you. Unless your an idiot and post your rs name and ip adress on this site, which i know you wont do.

But if they DO catch you, there will be no fine and they wont tell you, they will just ip ban you. Unless you gave Jagex your email by purchasing membership before, then you will get an email from them.

Read full topic

item.title: Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

orcashark:

Yes im pretty sure they allow private servers. Ill update you on that. If not i suggest purchasing a VPS from here www.vpsland.com

Thanks man! But i still have two questions.

  1. Will the chance be bigger they will catch me if i use a 508 instead of 317?
  2. How will they contact me? I really need sum sriosly hlp wht this mn.

Read full topic

item.title: Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

orcashark:

Who are you talking about? Jagex? If so then no fine or anything will be given. But please post me your Internet Service Provider. Some of them dont allow private server hosting and will suspend you from your internet.

I live in the netherlands, i use belkin.
